Clever and funny writing, objectively one of the best games ever put in the market. The puzzles are fun and easy enough to solve that keep the flow of the game going. The only problem is that it's a little longer than it needs to be, it loses steam around chapter 7. The first half might cause you to develop a humiliation kink. Haven't played the multiplayer because I don't have friends.

All in all, near perfect for what it is. Played it for the first time over a decade after it was released and it's as fresh and impressive. Both Portal games are cream of the crop. Buy them.

Когда жизнь дает тебе лимоны, не делай лимонад. Заставьте жизнь вернуть лимоны! РАЗОЗЛИТЕСЬ! Я НЕ ХОЧУ ВАШИХ ЧЕРТОВЫХ ЛИМОНОВ, КАКОГО ЧЕРТА МНЕ С НИМИ ДЕЛАТЬ? ТРЕБУЮ ПОСМОТРЕТЬ МЕНЕДЖЕРА ЖИЗНИ! СДЕЛАЙТЕ ЖИЗНЬ ПРАВОЙ ДНЯ, КОТОРЫЙ ДУМАЛ, ЧТО МОЖЕТ ПОДАРИТЬ CAVE JOHNSON ЛИМОНЫ! Ты знаешь кто я? Я ЧЕЛОВЕК, КОТОРЫЙ СОЖЖЕТ ВАШ ДОМ! С ЛИМОНАМИ! Я ЗАСТАВЛЮ МОИХ ИНЖЕНЕРОВ ИЗОБРЕСТИ ЗАЖИГАТЕЛЬНЫЙ ЛИМОН, КОТОРЫЙ СОЖЖЕТ ВАШ ДОМ!

The single-player and cooperative campaigns are a blast to play through. They make you use your brain just enough to solve puzzles, but not so much as to allow players to multi-task and shit. Then you realize that there's an super accessible custom level creator that literally anybody with the game can use. From here you'll either be playing levels that require a goddamn Harvard-level education to solve, or playing levels that were (literally, in some cases) made by a 3-year old on LSD.

So yeah overall it's an okay game I guess.

Portal 2 expands upon the first Portal game in every way. The game mechanics have been fine-tuned and expanded. The size of the puzzles have become much larger, and the puzzles themselves have become more complex. Portal 2 is much longer than the first game. The story is filled with more twists. There is much more information about the story to glean from Portal 2 than there was in the first game. Overall, I really enjoyed Portal 2. It is a huge step up from the first game, and it is most definitely worth playing.

I don't know why I haven't reviewed this game yet but seriously though, this game is amazing so if you haven't already played this game before or if you're a fan of the Valve games or something then buy it. It is so fun!

Trust me, it'll be worth it!

A classic. One of the all-time great games.

Engaging puzzles, funny and surprisingly compelling characters, as well as a co-op experience that is unique to video games.

If you haven't played, you're missing out.

Są gry, które spowodują u ciebie różne emocje, takie jak:
a) wkurwienie, bo jesteś po prostu słaby w dobre gry
b) wkurwienie, bo nie możesz zrozumieć, jak dobra gra może być zapomniana. 

Na prawdę. Sądzę, że jakby wyszła kolejna część serii portal, jest możliwość, że aktualni koneserzy takich gier pokroju fortnite, valorant (nie licząc mających życie wyjątków) by po prostu nie wiedzieli, że istniał tak dojebany format na gre.

P. S.
Ta gra. Jest jak czapka Klementynki z The Walking Dead. Jest jak kobieta pisząca do ciebie pierwsza.
Jest jak Tomasz Andrzej Działowy.
Jest jak twoja erekcja, gdy grasz genshin impact weebie.
Czyli w chuj dojebana.
